definition: hatred/animosity/enmity/foe/enemy/to feel animosity toward (the wealthy, foreigners etc)
enemy/to be a match for/to rival/to resist/to withstand
anger against a common enemy (idiom); joined in opposition to the same adversary

sentences.english: Ye have heard that it hath been said, Thou shalt love thy neighbour, and hate thine enemy.
sentences.chinese: 你们听见有话说，当爱你的邻舍，恨你的仇敌。

sentences.english: The lack of proprieties would make the most intimate friends turn to be the most decided enemies.
sentences.chinese: 缺乏礼节会使最亲密的朋友变成不共戴天的仇敌。

sentences.english: Lest the LORD see it, and it displease him, and he turn away his wrath from him.
sentences.chinese: 恐怕耶和华看见就不喜悦，将怒气从仇敌身上转过来。

sentences.english: Why must I go about mourning, oppressed by the enemy?
sentences.chinese: 我为何因仇敌的欺压时常哀痛呢？

sentences.english: He was basely slandered by his enemies.
sentences.chinese: 他受到仇敌卑鄙的诋毁。

sentences.english: Warriors such as the Samurai have traditionally used masks to intimidate their enemies.
sentences.chinese: 传统上，日本的武士用面具来威吓他们的仇敌。

sentences.english: 16 at the taunts of those who reproach and revile me, because of the enemy, who is bent on revenge.
sentences.chinese: 都因那辱骂毁谤人的声音，又因仇敌和报仇人的缘故。

sentences.english: For, lo, thine enemies, O LORD, for, lo, thine enemies shall perish; all the workers of iniquity shall be scattered.
sentences.chinese: 耶和华阿，你的仇敌都要灭亡，一切作孽的也要离散。

sentences.english: His wrath is kindled against me, and he hath counted me as his enemy.
sentences.chinese: 他对我怒火如焚，拿我当作他的仇敌。
他们是我们不共戴天的仇敌。

sentences.english: You have heard that it was said, 'Love your friends, hate your enemies.
sentences.chinese: 你们曾听人说过，“爱朋友，恨仇敌。”

sentences.english: You will be quite friendly with your enemy when you both die.
sentences.chinese: 当你和仇敌相继死去，彼此即彻底化敌为友了。

sentences.english: There you will offer yourselves for sale to your enemies as male and female slaves, but no one will buy you.
sentences.chinese: 在那里你必卖己身与仇敌作奴婢，却无人买。

sentences.english: The righteous shall rejoice when he seeth the vengeance: he shall wash his feet in the blood of the wicked.
sentences.chinese: 义人见仇敌遭报，就欢喜，要在恶人的血中洗脚。

sentences.english: For if a man finds his enemy, will he let him go away safe?
sentences.chinese: 人若遇见仇敌，岂肯放他平安无事地去呢？

sentences.english: Can we really translate arhat as the 'destroyer of enemies'?
sentences.chinese: 我们能否真的将阿罗汉翻译成“摧灭仇敌者”？

definition: (of enemies) cannot live under the same sky/absolutely irreconcilable
to fight to one's last gasp
to quarrel/to fall out with sb
